DockConcreteStrength.description: Dock Concrete Strength in PSI. Typically 4000

NonDockConcreteStrength.description: Non Dock Concrete Strength in PSI. Typically 4000

DockPanelSpantoThick.description: Ratio between dock tilt panel span and thickness. Typically between 46 and 58

TypPanelSpantoThick.description: Ratio between typical tilt panel span and thickness. Typically between 46 and 58

MaxTiltLenBeforeBreak.description: Maximum Tilt Length in feet. Typically 100

NumberOfBreaksinTilt.description: Number of breaks in tilt. Maximum of 15

AvgParapetHeight.description: Average parapet height for the building

RoundingOfParapetHeights.description: Rounding of parapet heights in inches

SlabDowels.description: Rebar used to connect tilt panels to the slab

StartPanelRx.description: The reaction on the left end of the tilt panel due to self weight and applied loads

EndPanelRx.description: The reaction on the right end of the tilt panel due to self weight and applied loads
